diff.contextLinesDesc: Number of unchanged lines to show before and after changes (default: 50)
diff.excludeDeletes: Exclude deleted files from diff output
diff.excludeDeletesDesc: When checked, only added and modified files will be shown in diff output (--diff-filter=AM)
diff.fileExtensionsDesc: Specify file extensions to include in diff output (includes both direct and subdirectory files). Leave empty to include all files. Examples: cs, *.razor, js ts, **/*.py
defaultReview.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter the default system prompt for code review
defaultReview.perspectivePlaceholder: Enter the default perspective for code review
review.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter the system prompt for code review
review.perspectivePlaceholder: Enter the perspective for code review
aws.modelNameDesc: Enter a custom model ID or select from the dropdown list of popular AWS Bedrock models
llm.providerDesc: Choose between AWS Bedrock or VS Code Language Model API
vscode.familyDesc: Specify the model available through VS Code LM API
language.label: Language / Ë®ÄË™û:
status.commitAlert: Please select a commit to compare with.
favoritePrompts.title: Prompt Title:
favoritePrompts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?
favoritePrompts.error.titleRequired: Please enter a title for the prompt.
favoritePrompts.error.promptsRequired: Please enter both system prompt and review perspective.
favoritePrompts.error.selectToDelete: Please select a prompt to delete.
favoritePrompts.exportDesc: You can export saved prompts as a JSON file.
favoritePrompts.importDesc: You can import a JSON file to register prompts.
fileFilter.maxSizeDesc: Files larger than this size will be excluded from review
fileFilter.excludeBinaryDesc: Automatically exclude binary files from code review
fileFilter.binaryExtensionsDesc: Comma-separated list of file extensions to treat as binary
export.includeMetadataDesc: Include git information and review settings in exported files
export.autoTimestampDesc: Automatically add timestamp to exported file names
